name: Citrine
description: Gaze upon the Crystal Bastion. Citrine's crystalline might supports allies on the battlefield. Combat only enhances her fractal beauty.

abilities.name: Fractured Blast
abilities.description: Slash and stagger enemies with a crystal blast that inflicts <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status. Enemies afflicted with this Status Effect have an increased chance of dropping Health and Energy Orbs.

abilities.name: Preserving Shell
abilities.description: Citrine guards herself and nearby allies with a crystalline shell that gradually decays. Kills and assists increase the defensive power of the shell.

abilities.name: Prismatic Gem
abilities.description: Deploy a gem that shoots prismatic beams. The gem targets enemies that are taking weapon damage from Citrine and her allies. Its beams inflict Heat, Cold, Toxin, and Electricity Status Effects. Status Chance and Status Duration increase for nearby allies.

abilities.name: Crystallize
abilities.description: Citrine summons crystal fractals. The fractals rush forward, seeking enemies. Enemies touched by the fractals are paralyzed by crystalline growths. Hit the growths to deal Critical Damage.

languages.description: Erblicke die Kristallbastion. Cintrines kristalline Macht unterstützt Verbündete auf dem Schlachtfeld. Der Kampf verstärkt ihre fraktale Schönheit nur noch.
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: Contemplez le Bastion de Cristal. La puissance cristalline de Citrine soutient les alliés sur le champ de bataille. Le combat ne fait qu'améliorer sa beauté fractale.
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: Ammira il Bastione di Cristallo. La potenza cristallina di Citrine supporta gli alleati sul campo di battaglia. Combattere non fa che esaltare la sua frattale bellezza.
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: 수정의 모습을 띤 수호자를 우러러보세요. 결정을 다루는 시트린의 힘은 전장에 선 아군을 지원해 줍니다. 반복과 변주로 짜여지는 그녀의 미는 전투를 거쳐도 더욱 아름다워질 뿐입니다.
languages.name: 시트린

languages.description: Contempla el Bastión de Cristal. El poder cristalino de Citrine apoya a los aliados en el campo de batalla. El combate solo realza su belleza fractal.
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: 凝视这位水晶卫士。Citrine 的水晶可以在战场上支持盟友。战斗只会增强她的分形之美。
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: Взгляните на хрустальный бастион. Кристаллическая мощь Цитрины поддерживает союзников на поле боя. Бой только усиливает её фрактальную красоту.
languages.name: Цитрина

languages.description: 水晶の城塞を刮目せよ。Citrineの結晶の力は、戦場で味方を支援する。戦闘は水晶面のきらめきを増すだけに過ぎない。
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: Spójrz na Kryształowy Bastion. Krystaliczna potęga Citrine wspiera jej sojuszników na polu bitwy. Walka wydobywa jej fraktalny wdzięk.
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: Contemple a fortaleza de cristal. O poder cristalino da Citrine presta suporte aos aliados no campo de batalha. O combate apenas aumenta seu encanto fractal.
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: 凝望水晶護衛。Citrine 的水晶之力在戰場上支援友方。戰鬥只會增強她的碎形美。
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: คอยเฝ้ามองพิทักษ์คริสตัล ผลึกของ Citrine อาจช่วยพันธมิตรที่อยู่ในสนามรบได้ การต่อสู้จะยิ่งช่วยเพิ่มความงามให้กับชิ้นส่วนของ Warframe ตัวนี้
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: Kristal Koruyucu. Citrine'in yüce kristal gücü, savaş alanındaki müttefikleri destekler. Çatışma, onun kırıcı güzelliğini artırır.
languages.name: Citrine

languages.description: Знайомтеся з кристалічною фортецею. Кришталева міць Цитрини підтримує союзників на полі бою. Бій лише підкреслює її фрактальну красу.
languages.name: Цитрина
